00004 #ifndef FEQ_EPS
00005 #define FEQ_EPS 1e-6
00006 #define FEQ_EPS2 1e-12
00007 #endif

00015 template < typename real = double , unsigned int dim = 3 >
00016 class VectorN {
00017 protected:
00018     real coord[dim]; 
00019 
00020 public:
00021     //
00022     // Standard constructors
00023     //
00024     
00026     VectorN () { 
00027         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] = 0; 
00028     }
00029     
00031     VectorN (const real v[]) {  
00032         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] = v[i]; 
00033     }
00034     
00036     VectorN (const VectorN<real,dim>& v) { 
00037         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] = v.coord[i]; 
00038     }
00039     
00040     //
00041     // Access methods
00042     //
00043     
00047     inline real& operator[] (unsigned i) { assert(i<dim); return coord[i]; }
00048 
00052     inline real  operator[] (unsigned i) const { assert(i<dim); return coord[i]; }
00053 
00054     //
00055     // Comparison operators
00056     //
00057     
00061     inline bool operator==(const VectorN<real,dim> &v) const {
00062         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) {
00063             real d = coord[i]-v.coord[i]; 
00064             if (d > FEQ_EPS2) return false;
00065         }
00066         return true;
00067     }
00068     
00073     inline bool operator!=(const VectorN<real,dim>& v) const {
00074         return !(*this == v);
00075     }
00076     
00077     //
00078     // Assignment and in-place arithmetic methods
00079     //
00080     
00084     inline VectorN<real,dim>& operator=(const VectorN<real,dim>& v) {
00085         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] = v.coord[i];
00086         return *this;
00087     };
00088     
00092     inline VectorN<real,dim>& operator+=(const VectorN<real,dim>& v) {
00093         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] += v.coord[i];
00094         return *this;
00095     };
00096     
00100     inline VectorN<real,dim>& operator-=(const VectorN<real,dim>& v) {
00101         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] -= v.coord[i];
00102         return *this;
00103     };
00104     
00108     inline VectorN<real,dim>& operator*=(real s) {
00109         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) coord[i] *= s;
00110         return *this;
00111     };
00112     
00116     inline VectorN<real,dim>& operator/=(real s) { return (*this) *= (1/s); }

00119     // Binary arithmetic methods

00125     inline VectorN<real,dim> operator+(const VectorN<real,dim>& v) const {
00126         VectorN<real,dim> r;
00127         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) r.coord[i] = coord[i]+v.coord[i];
00128         return r;

00135         VectorN<real,dim> r;

00137         return r;

00143     template<typename scalar>
00144     inline VectorN<real,dim> operator*(scalar s) const {
00145         VectorN<real,dim> r;
00146         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) r.coord[i] = coord[i] * (real) s;
00147         return r;
00148     };
00149     
00153     inline VectorN<real,dim> operator/(real s) const { 
00154         VectorN<real,dim> r;
00155         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) r.coord[i] = coord[i] / s;
00156         return r;
00157     }

00162     inline VectorN<real,dim> operator-() const {
00163         VectorN<real,dim> r = *this;
00164         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) r.coord [i] = -r.coord[i];
00165         return r;
00166     } 
00167     
00171     inline real operator*(const VectorN<real,dim>& v) const {
00172         real sum = 0;
00173         for (unsigned i = 0; i < dim; i++) sum += coord[i]*v.coord[i];
00174         return sum;
00175     }
00176     
00178     inline real norm2( void ) const { return (*this)*(*this); }
00179 
00181     inline real norm( void ) const { return (real) sqrt((double) this->norm2()); }

00203         assert (dim>1);

00260 template < typename real, unsigned int dim >
00261 inline real unitize(VectorN<real,dim>& v)
00262 {
00263     double l=norm2(v);
00264     if( l!=1.0 && l!=0.0 )   {
00265         l = sqrt(l);
00266         v /= l;
00267     }
00268     return l;
00269 }

00301 template < typename real = double , unsigned int dim = 3 >
00302 class PointN : public VectorN < real, dim > {
00303 public:
00304     //
00305     // Standard constructors
00306     //
00307     
00309     PointN () : VectorN<real,dim> () {};
00310     
00312     PointN (const real v[]) : VectorN<real,dim> (v) {};
00313     
00315     PointN (const VectorN<real,dim>& v) : VectorN<real,dim> (v) {}; 
00316 
00318     PointN (const real v) : VectorN<real,dim> () {
00319         for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++) this->coord [i] = v;
00320     }
00321 
00323     PointN (const real x, const real y) : VectorN<real,dim> () {
00324         assert (dim == 2);
00325         this->coord [0] = x;
00326         this->coord [1] = y;
00327     }
00328 
00330     PointN (const real x, const real y, const real z) : VectorN<real,dim> () {
00331         assert (dim == 3);
00332         this->coord [0] = x;
00333         this->coord [1] = y;
00334         this->coord [2] = z;
00335     }
00336 
00339     inline void set( const VectorN<real,dim>& v ) { 
00340         for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++) this->coord [i] = v[i];
00341     }
00342     
00344     inline VectorN<real,dim> toVector ( void ) { return VectorN<real,dim> (*this); }
00345     
00347     inline PointN<real,dim> affineSum( real alpha , const PointN<real,dim>& p) const {
00348         return (PointN<real,dim>) (alpha * p);
00349     }
00350     
00355     inline PointN<real,dim> min(const PointN<real,dim> & p) const {
00356         PointN<real,dim> r;
00357         for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++) r[i] = min(*this[i],p[i]);
00358         return r;
00359     }
00360 
00365     inline PointN<real,dim> max(const PointN<real,dim> & p) const {
00366         PointN<real,dim> r;
00367         for (int i = 0; i < dim; i++) r[i] = max(*this[i],p[i]);
00368         return r;
00369     }
00370     
00372     inline real dist2 (const PointN<real,dim> & p) const {
00373         return ((*this) - p).norm2();
00374     }
00375     
00377     inline real dist (const PointN<real,dim> & p) const {
00378         return ((*this) - p).norm();
00379     }
00380 
00381     
00382 };
